title: Literary landmarks of Edinburgh,
author: Hutton, Laurence
snippet: Here the "Waverley Novels " were planned and discussed, and were read from manuscript or advance-sheets to the happy and select few in the secret of the Great Unknown. Ballantyne's printing- office was near the foot of Leith Wynd, now Cranston Street, and is at present an upholstery and cabinet-making establishment.
